text: 19.13: Mk 9.38Mbe maaŋ mbuim, Zudaiŋ mbari, mbe tamtam mba bigi ga ruav, gumgi gu mbigi tɨn ŋiniŋgi mbatɨgi ga vharvharigi. Mbe maaŋ mbuim, mbe mbari Guma Bakɨme Zisas zɨn mparav, ana zɨ zitav, gumgi gu mbigir tɨn ŋiniŋgi mbatɨgi ga vharvhara za mbui. Mbe ruav khaŋ nzuai, “Nza Por bun nzuai Zisas zɨn panan kama havharar nde nzuai, nde kɨrar hɨri.”
